reviewtext: Get these binoculars, if you can afford them.  I have looked at, or through, Zeiss and Leicas, and the Canon's are of equal quality.The image stabilization works, period.  You can see detail that is NOT possible without IS.  Also, the binoculars are very usable without the IS feature, more so than I would have thought.My suggestion, buy the highest magnification that will fit your application, since IS gives the greatest benefit at higher powers.
